A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Between the poor humor that only distracts from the story\, the uninteresting slew of characters\, the myriad of subplots that go nowhere\, and the bizarre treatment of original characters\, this movie actually does nothing to honor the series' legacy while adding \"surprising\" twists that add nothing to the mythos. Also\, the word \"fuel\" is said about 6 times in the first act. Since when was fuel ever a problem in Star Wars? Incidentally\, that subplot also went nowhere\, which is indicative of the entire movie. This thing is a bloated mess with a shabby script and undisciplined direction.
